short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize your productivity by locking into one task at a time while blocking out distractions and getting motivated

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Its time to LockIn! Never fall behind on work by locking into tasks and eliminating distractions! Stay motivated and on track by AI powered motivational quotes crafted based on your current task. 
With LockIn, you can set quick daily goals, such as "Complete my Math Homework," ensuring tasks are manageable and achievable. Each task triggers a pomodoro clock timer for optimal productivity, while the app simultaneously blocks digital distractions, ensuring that tasks are completed on time.

NEW FEATURES
- Partially block Youtube(Shorts, Recommended Videos, and more!)

Features Include
- Task Management
- Pomodoro Timer
- Website blocking
- Motivational AI ~ Customize your AI anyway you want!
- Roadmap/Milestone tracking
